summary: Reza explodes into the boring life of writer Eric, she's unpredictable and intense. After she moves in with him, jealousy and fits of bizarre self-destruction become part of her quixotic moods.
cast: Antonie Kamerling|Angela Schijf|Beau van Erven Dorens|Florence Kasumba|Doroth√©e Capelluto|Anniek Pheifer|Leo Hogenboom|Guusje Westermann|Tijn Docter|Arjan ten Broecke|Cynthia de Graaff|Antoinette Jelgersma|Titus Muizelaar|Rinco van der Baan|Marieke de Kruijf|Domenico La Ferrara|Lukas Dijkema|Nathalie de Wit|Carol Lecacheur|Alice Reys|Ferd Hugas|Marloes van den Heuvel|Arlette Adriani|Celia Nufaar|Nico Peek|Jildou Straat|Frederik Brom|Chanella Hodge|Bacha Chilaia|Ronald Giphart
title: Ik ook van jou
